INSERT ALL
INTO MSSAPP.MC_ACUINT_TXN_DTL (ACUINT_TXN_DTL_ID, ACUINT_TXN_ID, TXN_DATE, CR_ACUINT, DR_ACUINT, LEDG_BAL, CAT1_DSCNT_VAL, CAT2_DSCNT_VAL, CAT3_DSCNT_VAL, MRGN_AGE, CR_INTSCH_VID, DR_INTSCH_VID, WAIVE_CR_ACUINT, WAIVE_DR_ACUINT, INTWV_MTD_CDE, ACUINT_TXN_DTL_STAT_CDE, ACUINT_TXN_TYP_CDE, REC_VER_NUM, INIT_TIME, LAST_UPD_TIME, LAST_UPD_BY, TAG_SEQ, NORMAL_OD_BAL, PENAL_ACUINT, WAIVE_PENAL_ACUINT, INTSCH_ASGN_RULE_CDE, TTL_SEGR_FUND_DV, TTL_SAME_CCY_DV, ALOC_SAME_CCY_SEQ_NUM, ALOC_SAME_CCY_DV, UNCO_OD_BY_SAME_CCY, REMN_DV, EXCH_RATE_TO_BASE_CCY, BASE_CCY_REMN_DV, BASE_CCY_TTL_CRS_CCY_DV, ALOC_CRS_CCY_SEQ_NUM, BASE_CCY_ALOC_CRS_CCY_DV, EXCH_RATE_FROM_BASE_CCY, ALOC_CRS_CCY_DV) VALUES (#{item.acuintTxnDtlId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.acuintTxnId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.txnDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.crAcuint,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.drAcuint,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.ledgBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.cat1DscntVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.cat2DscntVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.cat3DscntVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.mrgnAge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.crIntschVid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.drIntschVid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.waiveCrAcuint,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.waiveDrAcuint,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.intwvMtdCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.acuintTxnDtlStatCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.acuintTxnTypCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.recVerNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.initTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tagSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.normalOdBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.penalAcuint,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.waivePenalAcuint,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.intschAsgnRuleCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ttlSegrFundDv,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.ttlSameCcyDv,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.alocSameCcySeqNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.alocSameCcyDv,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.baseCcyTtlCrsCcyDv,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.alocCrsCcySeqNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.baseCcyAlocCrsCcyDv,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.exchRateFromBaseCcy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.alocCrsCcyDv,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
